column1: Encryption must be applied as per Authority standards for all data transmitted between systems via TLS or SSL
All encryption material that is required for secure communications must be only accessible via the requesting service as read only access.
The database files and data must be encrypted.
All encrypted channels and stored data must not use a default or example certificate.
All encryption keys must be generated for a specific use case.
All encryption keys must be fully protected.
All encryption certificates must be provided by the Authority Enterprise Certificate Authority (CA).
